title: mc启动不了 刚装完win7和java8
author: _SOS_
txt_content:
刚装完win7旗舰版,装了个java8 启动mc时发现启动不了了(以前xp的时候能启动的)
错误报告(164原版):
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Oh - I know what I did wrong!

Time: 14-6-7 下午6:12
Description: Initializing game

org.lwjgl.LWJGLException: Pixel format not accelerated
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.nChoosePixelFormat(Native Method)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.choosePixelFormat(WindowsPeerInfo.java:52)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsDisplay.createWindow(WindowsDisplay.java:244)

        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:757)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:739)

        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:131)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:27)

Stacktrace:

mclauncher和mclanucherMK都试过

replies.author: RzzK
replies.txt_content: 下载JAVAx64 我就这样就好了

replies.author: _SOS_
replies.txt_content:
RzzK 发表于 2014-6-7 18:30
下载JAVAx64 我就这样就好了
下的就是=w=

replies.author: RedStoneMC
replies.txt_content: 刚安装的win7需要显卡驱动才能正常游戏，去下个鲁大师把，并按照提示显卡驱动，我朋友的也是这样搞好的。
